metadata.title: CVE-2023-43281 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Double Free vulnerability in Nothings Stb Image.h v.2.28 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to thestbi_load_gif_main function.

criterions.comment: bibledit package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
emscripten package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
goxel package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
libsfml package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
love package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mame package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
visp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
